item.title: CVE-2010-2243|2024-08-07T02:25:07.472Z -- linux-2.6 -- linux-2.6
item.description: A vulnerability exists in kernel/time/clocksource.c in the Linux kernel before 2.6.34 where on non-GENERIC_TIME systems (GENERIC_TIME=n), accessing /sys/devices/system/clocksource/clocksource0/current_clocksource results in an OOPS.
